survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Automated Car Wash Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction levels with automated car wash services, focusing on service quality, ease of use, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use automated car wash services?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use automated car wash services?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an automated car wash service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Limit to 6 options for readability.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an automated car wash service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of your vehicle after using an automated car wash?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected anything other than 'First-time user' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure neutral option is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of your vehicle after using an automated car wash?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected anything other than 'First-time user' in Q1

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with automated car wash services? If yes, please describe.
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field with a character limit of 500. Provide enough space for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with automated car wash services? If yes, please describe.
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your preferred automated car wash service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your preferred automated car wash service to others?
